name: qr_code_image_copy
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool qr.
Tool description: This API take URL string and returns the QR code image
API description: This end point 'GET' request with url or string as a parameter. The API will return an image of the QR code, which can be downloaded by the client.

url.description: The URL to be encoded as a QR code.
